tags.name: mds-accordion
tags.description:
# mckesson-design-system accordion A styled accordion or expandable panel that allows for a header and content. the component will dynamically expand to the size of the contents. ## Installation ### npm ```bash npm i `@mcklabs/mds-accordion` --save ``` ### yarn ```bash yarn add `@mcklabs/mds-accordion` ``` ### Rendered ![](samples/accordion.png) ### Usage ```html
Default open
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
``` ### React Component ```jsx import `@mcklabs/mds-accordion` export const accordion = () => (
Default collapse
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
) ``` ### Set the following variables in your imported SCSS/CSS file or html `style` tag, before usage ```css :root { --mdsAccordionIconColor: purple; --mdsAccordionIconColorHover: orange; } ``` ### Rendered in the browser ![](samples/accordion-custom.gif)

attributes.name: elevation
attributes.description: Sets the elevation for the accordion's internal MdsPaper

attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Sets the initial state and can be toggled to open or close it

properties.name: elevation
properties.description: Sets the elevation for the accordion's internal MdsPaper

events.name: accordion-state
events.description: the current state of the accordion

cssProperties.name: --mdsAccordionIconColor
cssProperties.description: Overrides the icon color for the accordion indicator button.

cssProperties.name: --mdsAccordionIconColorHover
cssProperties.description: Overrides the icon color on :hover for the accordion indicator button.

cssProperties.name: --mdsBannerContentMaxWidth

tags.name: mds-button
tags.description:
# mckesson-design-system button A styled button ## Installation ### npm ```bash npm i `@mcklabs/mds-button` --save ``` ### yarn ```bash yarn add `@mcklabs/mds-button` ``` ### HTML Usage ```html Primary Primary Rounded Primary Disabled Secondary Secondary Rounded Secondary Disabled Outlined Outlined Rounded Outlined Disabled ``` ### React Component ```jsx import `@mcklabs/mds-button` export const buttons = () => (
Primary Primary Rounded Primary Disabled Secondary Secondary Rounded Secondary Disabled Outlined Outlined Rounded Outlined Disabled
) ``` ### HTML Usage ```html Rate Kittens ``` ### Rendered in the browser ![](samples/buttons.png) ### Set the following variables in your imported SCSS/CSS file or html `style` tag, before usage ```css :root { --mdsBannerMaxWidth: 1024px; --mdsBannerColor: purple; --mdsBannerBackgroundColor: rgba(255, 166, 0, 0.783); } ```

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: give the button an href and it will render an `anchor` tag with the appropriate href instead of a `button` tag

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: variant of the button

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: sets the enabled or disabled state

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonPrimaryColor
cssProperties.description: Overrides the primary color

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonPrimaryColorHover
cssProperties.description: Overrides the primary color on hover

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonSecondaryColor
cssProperties.description: Overrides the secondary color

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonSecondaryColorHover
cssProperties.description: Overrides the secondary color on hover

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonOulinedBackgroundColor
cssProperties.description: Overrides the outlined background color

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonOulinedBackgroundColorHover
cssProperties.description: Overrides the outlined background color on hover

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonOulinedBorder
cssProperties.description: Overrides the outlined border color

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonOulinedBorderHover
cssProperties.description: Overrides the  outlined border color on hover

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonOulinedColor
cssProperties.description: Overrides the outlined color

cssProperties.name: --mdsButtonOulinedColorHover
cssProperties.description: Overrides the outlined color on hover

tags.name: mds-chip
tags.description:
# mckesson-design-system chip
A styled chip that functions similar a tag or chip in bootstrap or material ui.

## Installation

### npm
```bash
npm i `@mcklabs/mds-chip` --save
```

### yarn
```bash
yarn add `@mcklabs/mds-chip`
```

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: the value for the chip

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: the label for the chip

events.name: closechip
events.description: emitted when the X is clicked.

cssProperties.name: --mdsChipColor
cssProperties.description: Overrides the border color

cssProperties.name: --mdsChipBackgroundColor
cssProperties.description: Overrides the color of the checkbox

cssProperties.name: --mdsChipIconColor
cssProperties.description: Overrides the color of the checkbox

cssProperties.name: --mdsChipIconColorHover
cssProperties.description: Overrides the color of the checkbox

cssProperties.name: --mdsChipIconColorActive
cssProperties.description: Overrides the color of the checkbox

tags.name: mds-paper
tags.description:
# mckesson-design-system paper A styled paper that you can set the elevation property for more drastic effects. ## Installation ### npm ```bash npm i `@mcklabs/mds-paper` --save ``` ### yarn ```bash yarn add `@mcklabs/mds-paper` ``` ### HTML Usage ```html Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum. ``` ### React Component ```js import `@mcklabs/mds-banner` export const paper = () => ( Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum. ) ``` ### Rendered in the browser ![](samples/paper.png)
### Set the following variables in your imported SCSS/CSS file or html `style` tag, before usage ```css :root { --mdsPaperColor: orange; --mdsPaperBackgroundColor: purple; --mdsPaperBoxShadowHOffsetColor: rgba(255, 0, 255, 0.2); --mdsPaperBoxShadowVOffsetColor: rgba(255, 0, 255, 0.14); --mdsPaperBoxShadowBlurColor: rgba(255, 0, 255, 0.12); } ``` ### Rendered in the browser ![](samples/paper-custom.png)

tags.description:
# mckesson-design-system react-support
A wrapper to handle custom events within any custom elements you want to use within react.
It will also destory the events on unmount for you.

## Installation

### npm
```bash
npm i `@mcklabs/mds-react` --save
```

### yarn
```bash
yarn add `@mcklabs/mds-react`
```

### React Component
```jsx
import WebComponentWrapper from `@mcklabs/mds-react`

export const buttons = () => (
<WebComponentWrapper tag="my-element" onMyCustomEvent={()=> console.log('I haz cuztem events!')} />
)
```

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description: tag to render

attributes.name: on(.*)
attributes.description:
(.*) is the event to listen to camelCased. It is converted to kebab-case. 
If your CustomEvent's name is `custom-event-name` you need to set the prop as onCustomEventName in react.
